item.title: Six lights in a row are not working, 20th January
item.description:

item.title: Chesterfield Grove Flytipping of Christmas Trees, 20th January
item.description:
Along Chesterfield Grove and on the corner where the bikes are kept. Christmas trees have been dumped all along the pavements causing mess due to the shedding of sharp needles and dangerous obstruction of the pavement for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 56a Chesterfield Grove-Flytipping 2nd Complaint, 20th January
item.description:
2nd complaint: Flytipping has yet again occurred from here. Health and safety hazard where items can be blown down injuring pedestrians and also blocking the pavement. Multiple complaints of this conduct submitted but the flytipping keeps occurring, thus now reporting the number of times the complaints have been filed, highlighting the complete disregard of not adhering to law regarding fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp post not working outside number 84, 20th January

item.description:
